thread.title_full: Zerto Kicks Off AWS re:Invent 2015 by Providing Value-Added

author: Zerto
title: Zerto Kicks Off AWS re:Invent 2015 by Providing Value-Added
text:
LAS VEGAS , October 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Zerto , setting the standard for protection, recovery and migration of data in cloud and virtualized data centers, today announced it will kick off AWS re:Invent 2015 highlighting solutions to future-proof IT strategy and improving IT service continuity for customers using Amazon Web Services (AWS). As a member of the AWS Partner Network (APN), Zerto focuses on providing customers increased IT infrastructure flexibility using Zerto's Cloud Continuity Platform â„¢  for easy, multi-purpose application on AWS. Technical experts from Zerto and customer TenCate will co-present at The Cube, and demonstrate how TenCate uses Zerto to protect data in both VMware and AWS environments using Zerto Virtual Replication to improve data center efficiency and increase flexibility.
Zerto will also participate in a Tech Talk session with AWS, demonstrating the ease of moving virtual machines from VMware environments to AWS. As a returning sponsor of AWS re:Invent, Zerto will exhibit in booth 1158 and host additional contests and giveaways throughout the event.
Zerto recently achieved the APN Storage Competency. The APN Competencies are designed to highlight APN Partners who have demonstrated technical proficiency and proven customer success in specialized solution areas. APN Partners qualify for one or more APN Competency by having a strong overall AWS practice, showcasing proven customer success, and demonstrating technical readiness within the competency.
Supporting Quotes  
Kjel Hanson , VP of Engineering and Chief Cloud Architect, Denovo  
"Organizations of all sizes and industry types are constantly striving to optimize their data center operations to help achieve their business objectives. Giving Denovo's customers incomparable access and support for public cloud environments as they redefine and future-proof their IT strategies has fundamentally changed the dynamic of our business. Using Zerto on AWS, we're able to seamlessly build our Infrastructure as a Service platform and scale effortlessly using enterprise-level technologies, which is a critical success factor as we deepen our penetration in the cloud service provider market."
Ziv Kedem , CEO, Zerto  
"The rapid pace of change in the cloud has taken many organizations by storm, leaving them needing support for managing systems and technologies in a very efficient manner to ensure maximum ROI and business performance. Being able to integrate with leading public cloud providers such as AWS is a significant aspect of Zerto's Cloud Continuity Platform as we continue to execute on our goal of redefining the BC/DR product category as not just insurance policy to guard against natural and man-made disasters, but rather provide a competitive advantage."

About Zerto  
Zerto is committed to keeping enterprise and cloud IT running 24/7 by providing innovative, simple, reliable and scalable business continuity software solutions. Through the Zerto Cloud Continuity Platform, organizations can seamlessly move and protect virtualized workloads between public, private and hybrid clouds. The company's flagship product, Zerto Virtual Replication, has become the standard for protection, recovery and migration of applications in cloud and virtualized data centers, and won numerous awards, including Best of Show at VMworld 2011, Best of VMworld Europe 2014, as well as 2011, 2012 and 2013 Product of the Year Awards for its innovative hypervisor-based replication approach. For more information, go to http://www.zerto.com .
